meanings.sent1: The astringencies of the medicine helped to tighten the skin.
meanings.sent2: The astringencies of the lemon juice made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent3: The astringencies of the situation made everyone laugh at the unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the astringencies of a bitter truth, cutting through the lies.
meanings.sent5: The astringencies of winter air made her cheeks rosy and cold.

meanings.definition: The harshness or severity of a taste.
meanings.sent1: The astringencies of the vinegar were too strong for my liking.
meanings.sent2: I could not handle the astringencies of the bitter coffee.
meanings.sent3: The astringencies of the spicy chili made my eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The astringencies of disappointment lingered in her mouth like a bitter aftertaste.
meanings.sent5: The astringencies of the burnt toast made breakfast less enjoyable.
